title: A new way to pay old debts a comoedie as it hath beene often acted at the Phænix in Drury-Lane, by the Queenes Maiesties seruants. The author. Philip Massinger.
author: Massinger, Philip, 1583-1640.
publisher: Printed by E[lizabeth] P[urslowe] for Henry Seyle, dwelling in S. Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Tygers head,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
